=== Game Rules ===
BasicGame square_size=30
    SpriteSet
        floor > Immovable hidden=True img=oryx/backLBlue
        bite > OrientedFlicker limit=1
        damage > Immovable img=oryx/spike2
        food > Immovable
            cheese > img=newset/cheese
            butter > img=newset/butter
            cake > img=newset/cake
        trap > Immovable
            cheeseTrap > img=newset/cheese
            butterTrap > img=newset/butter
            cakeTrap > img=newset/cake
        moving >
            avatar > ShootAvatar stype=bite img=oryx/rat1
            enemy >
                monsterQuick > RandomNPC color=BLACK cooldown=2 cons=6 img=newset/cat
                monsterNormal > RandomNPC cooldown=4 cons=8 img=newset/cat
                monsterSlow > RandomNPC color=YELLOW cooldown=8 cons=12 img=newset/cat
        wall > Immovable img=oryx/wall3 autotiling=True
    LevelMapping
        c > cheese floor
        C > cheeseTrap floor
        b > butter floor
        B > butterTrap floor
        k > cake floor
        K > cakeTrap floor
        . > floor
        w > wall floor
        1 > monsterQuick floor
        2 > monsterNormal floor
        3 > monsterSlow floor
        A > avatar floor
    TerminationSet
        SpriteCounter  stype=avatar  limit=0 win=False
        MultiSpriteCounter  stype1=food stype2=trap limit=0 win=True
        Timeout limit=1200 win=False
    InteractionSet
        moving wall EOS > stepBack
        avatar enemy > killSprite scoreChange=-5
        avatar trap > killSprite scoreChange=-5
        avatar damage > killSprite scoreChange=-5
        food avatar > killSprite scoreChange=2
        trap avatar > transformTo stype=damage

        enemy enemy > stepBack
        enemy trap > stepBack
        enemy food > stepBack
        wall bite > killSprite
        trap bite > transformTo stype=damage scoreChange=1


You are controlling the avatar in a grid-based game.

=== Sprite Mapping ===
avatar -> 'a'
background -> '.'
cheese floor -> 'c'
cheeseTrap floor -> 'C'
butter floor -> 'b'
butterTrap floor -> 'B'
cake floor -> 'k'
cakeTrap floor -> 'K'
floor -> '.'
wall floor -> 'w'
monsterQuick floor -> '1'
monsterNormal floor -> '2'
monsterSlow floor -> '3'
butter -> '0'
butterTrap -> '1'
cake -> '2'
cheese -> '3'
cheeseTrap -> '4'
monsterNormal -> '5'
monsterQuick -> '6'
wall -> '7'

=== Current State ===
777777777777777777777777777
733333337.........733333337
700000007.........700000007

7777777.............7777777

=== Available Actions ===
0: ACTION_NIL
1: ACTION_USE
2: ACTION_LEFT
3: ACTION_RIGHT
4: ACTION_DOWN
5: ACTION_UP

=== Avatar Position ===
(Left is decreasing x, Right is increasing x, Up is increasing y, Down is decreasing y)(y=4, x=14)

Please choose the best action and respond in the format: ``` Action:<action number> ```

To determine the best action for the avatar, we need to analyze the current state of the game and the available actions.

The avatar is currently at position (4, 14) and the surrounding tiles are as follows:

- Up (3, 14): `.` (floor)
- Down (5, 14): `7` (wall)
- Left (4, 13): `.` (floor)
- Right (4, 15): `5` (monsterNormal)

The available actions are:
- ACTION_NIL (0): Do nothing
- ACTION_USE (1): Use an item (not applicable here)
- ACTION_LEFT (2): Move left to (4, 13)
- ACTION_RIGHT (3): Move right to (4, 15) (which is a monster)
- ACTION_DOWN (4): Move down to (5, 14) (which is a wall)
- ACTION_UP (5): Move up to (3, 14)

The best action is to move left to (4, 13), as it is a safe move onto a floor tile. Moving right would result in encountering a monster, which would be detrimental to the avatar's health.

Thus, the best action is:

``` Action:2 ```

=== Game Rules ===
BasicGame square_size=30
    SpriteSet
        floor > Immovable hidden=True img=oryx/backLBlue
        bite > OrientedFlicker limit=1
        damage > Immovable img=oryx/spike2
        food > Immovable
            cheese > img=newset/cheese
            butter > img=newset/butter
            cake > img=newset/cake
        trap > Immovable
            cheeseTrap > img=newset/cheese
            butterTrap > img=newset/butter
            cakeTrap > img=newset/cake
        moving >
            avatar > ShootAvatar stype=bite img=oryx/rat1
            enemy >
                monsterQuick > RandomNPC color=BLACK cooldown=2 cons=6 img=newset/cat
                monsterNormal > RandomNPC cooldown=4 cons=8 img=newset/cat
                monsterSlow > RandomNPC color=YELLOW cooldown=8 cons=12 img=newset/cat
        wall > Immovable img=oryx/wall3 autotiling=True
    LevelMapping
        c > cheese floor
        C > cheeseTrap floor
        b > butter floor
        B > butterTrap floor
        k > cake floor
        K > cakeTrap floor
        . > floor
        w > wall floor
        1 > monsterQuick floor
        2 > monsterNormal floor
        3 > monsterSlow floor
        A > avatar floor
    TerminationSet
        SpriteCounter  stype=avatar  limit=0 win=False
        MultiSpriteCounter  stype1=food stype2=trap limit=0 win=True
        Timeout limit=1200 win=False
    InteractionSet
        moving wall EOS > stepBack
        avatar enemy > killSprite scoreChange=-5
        avatar trap > killSprite scoreChange=-5
        avatar damage > killSprite scoreChange=-5
        food avatar > killSprite scoreChange=2
        trap avatar > transformTo stype=damage

        enemy enemy > stepBack
        enemy trap > stepBack
        enemy food > stepBack
        wall bite > killSprite
        trap bite > transformTo stype=damage scoreChange=1

=== Game Rules ===
BasicGame square_size=30
    SpriteSet
        floor > Immovable hidden=True img=oryx/backLBlue
        bite > OrientedFlicker limit=1
        damage > Immovable img=oryx/spike2
        food > Immovable
            cheese > img=newset/cheese
            butter > img=newset/butter
            cake > img=newset/cake
        trap > Immovable
            cheeseTrap > img=newset/cheese
            butterTrap > img=newset/butter
            cakeTrap > img=newset/cake
        moving >
            avatar > ShootAvatar stype=bite img=oryx/rat1
            enemy >
                monsterQuick > RandomNPC color=BLACK cooldown=2 cons=6 img=newset/cat
                monsterNormal > RandomNPC cooldown=4 cons=8 img=newset/cat
                monsterSlow > RandomNPC color=YELLOW cooldown=8 cons=12 img=newset/cat
        wall > Immovable img=oryx/wall3 autotiling=True
    LevelMapping
        c > cheese floor
        C > cheeseTrap floor
        b > butter floor
        B > butterTrap floor
        k > cake floor
        K > cakeTrap floor
        . > floor
        w > wall floor
        1 > monsterQuick floor
        2 > monsterNormal floor
        3 > monsterSlow floor
        A > avatar floor
    TerminationSet
        SpriteCounter  stype=avatar  limit=0 win=False
        MultiSpriteCounter  stype1=food stype2=trap limit=0 win=True
        Timeout limit=1200 win=False
    InteractionSet
        moving wall EOS > stepBack
        avatar enemy > killSprite scoreChange=-5
        avatar trap > killSprite scoreChange=-5
        avatar damage > killSprite scoreChange=-5
        food avatar > killSprite scoreChange=2
        trap avatar > transformTo stype=damage

        enemy enemy > stepBack
        enemy trap > stepBack
        enemy food > stepBack
        wall bite > killSprite
        trap bite > transformTo stype=damage scoreChange=1
